doc.name: ScopeExtendingAttribute
doc.description: An attribute that extends its container's scope. Any parameter contained by such an attribute has the same visibility as parameters of the container of the attribute. They are shadowed, however, by parameters of the container. That is, if the container has a parameter with the same name as one in the parameter set, the one in the container provides the value to any observer.
doc.author: Xiaojun Liu
